It follows the story of Woody, who has just returned home from his adventure with Buzz Lightyear in "Toy Story." However, when he tries to go back to his family, he discovers that his old friends, including George Carver, the Tin Man, and the Fire Hydrant, have all been taken by aliens, and replaced with robots. Frustrated by this discovery, Woody decides to embark on a new adventure, in search of his old friends George Carver, the Tin Man, and for the Fire Hydrant.

To do this, he sets off from his home on the farm of Mr. and Mrs. Johnson (voiced by James Earl Jones)), where he encounters Buzz Lightyear (voiced by Tom Hanks)) on a road near a barn. Buzz tells Woody that they are part of an intergalactic organization called the "Inventors"."
